<script>
// 这个文件重写了string原型的replace方法和match方法
// 和react技术栈有冲突，需要fix一下
function fixStringProto(){
if(!window.moocTempReplace){
Object.defineProperty(window, "moocTempReplace", {
enumerable: false,
configurable: false,
writable: false,
value: String.prototype.replace
});
}
if(!window.moocTempMatch){
Object.defineProperty(window, "moocTempMatch", {
enumerable: false,
configurable: false,
writable: false,
value: String.prototype.match
});
}
}
fixStringProto();
</script>

window.__globalErrorEvents = [];
function errorEventHandler(e) {
window.__globalErrorEvents.push(e);
}
function addEvent(el, ev, fn) {
if (el) {
if (el.addEventListener) {
el.addEventListener(ev, fn);
} else if (el.attachEvent) {
el.attachEvent(ev, fn);
}
}
}
addEvent(window, 'error', errorEventHandler);
// delete window.addEvent; // error reported in ie9, why do this?

<script src="//hubble-js-bucket.nosdn.127.net/DATracker.sync.1.6.11.js"></script>
<script>
DATracker.init("MA-A976-948FFA05E931", {
truncateLength: 255,
persistence: "localStorage",
cross_subdomain_cookie: false,
use_app_track: true,
heatmap: {
isTrackLink: false,
collect_all: false,
collect_url: function() {
//使用场景如：
//学习页面不再采集
if (location.href.indexOf("/learn/") > -1) {
return false;
} else {
return true;
}
},
// 自定义设置采集的元素的路径，需返回该元素的path，
// 该路径是热力图渲染时查找元素所需，请正确设置
set_collect_element_path: function(targetElement, heatmap) {
try {
var pathMap = {"a:nth-child":"ANC","aside:nth-child":"ASNC","article:nth-child":"ATNC","button:nth-child":"BNC","code:nth-child":"CDNC","canvas:nth-child":"CVNC","div:nth-child":"DVNC","footer:nth-child":"FTNC","form:nth-child":"FMNC","frame:nth-child":"FRNC","header:nth-child":"HDNC","iframe:nth-child":"IFNC","img:nth-child":"IGNC","input:nth-child":"IPNC","label:nth-child":"LBNC","li:nth-child":"LINC","p:nth-child":"PNC","section:nth-child":"SCNC","span:nth-child":"SPNC","table:nth-child":"TBNC","tbody:nth-child":"TYNC","td:nth-child":"TDNC","textarea:nth-child":"TANC","tfoot:nth-child":"TFNC","th:nth-child":"THNC","ul:nth-child":"ULNC"}
var selector = function(targetElement) {
var i = (targetElement.parentNode && 9 == targetElement.parentNode.nodeType) ? -1 : heatmap.getDomIndex(targetElement);
var pathStr = targetElement.tagName.toLowerCase()
+ (~i ? ':nth-child(' + (i + 1) + ')' : '');
for( let key in pathMap) {
var re = new RegExp(key, 'g');
pathStr = pathStr.replace(re, pathMap[key]);
}
return pathStr;
};
var getDomSelector = function(targetElement,arr) {
if(!targetElement || !targetElement.parentNode || !targetElement.parentNode.children){
return false;
}
arr = arr && arr.join ? arr : [];
var name = targetElement.nodeName.toLowerCase();
if (!targetElement || name === 'body' || 1 != targetElement.nodeType) {
arr.unshift('body');
return arr.join(' > ');
}
arr.unshift(selector(targetElement));
return getDomSelector(targetElement.parentNode, arr);
}
return getDomSelector(targetElement);
} catch (error) {
}
}
}
})
if(localStorage.getItem('isBrowerSupportWebp') === null){
var isBrowerSupportWebp = function () {
try {
return document.createElement('canvas').toDataURL('image/webp', 0.5).indexOf('data:image/webp') === 0;
} catch(err) {
return false;
}
}
localStorage.setItem('isBrowerSupportWebp', isBrowerSupportWebp())
}
</script>

<div class="m-recCourse-title"><span>推荐课程</span></div>
<div class="m-recCourse-cardList" id="j-index-recommend-course"><div class="ux-slider-slider-wrapper f-pr" style="width: 1276px; height: 275px;">

    <div class="ux-scroll-container" style="width: 1276px; height: 275px;">
	    <div class="ux-scroll-box f-pr" style="width: 6400px; left: 0px;">

<!--Regular list-->
<div class="u-liveCard-container  f-fl f-transition ga-click" data-cate="首页_推荐课程" data-action="【考研政治】40分钟阐明辩证法（无回放）点击" data-label="//www.icourse163.org/live/480000002043187.htm"><a href="//www.icourse163.org/live/480000002043187.htm" target="_blank" class="u-liveCard-container_a1"><div class="u-liveCard-img"><img width="236" height="136" alt="" src="https://edu-image.nosdn.127.net/0f293297abea4fe482b2f7fb2ce0032c.jpg?imageView&amp;quality=100" class="u-liveCard-img_img2"></div><div class="u-liveCard-imgTop"></div><div class="u-liveCard-title"><span class="u-liveCard-title_span3">【考研政治】40分钟阐明辩证法（无回放）</span></div><div class="u-liveCard-teacher"><span class="f-thide u-liveCard-teacher_span4">孔昱力</span></div><div class="u-liveCard-school"><span class="f-thide u-liveCard-school_span5">慕课考研 孔昱力</span></div><div class="u-liveCard-desc"><span class="u-liveCard-desc_span6">【考研政治】40分钟阐明辩证法（无回放）</span></div><div class="u-liveCardOnFunc"><!--Regular if27--><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t"><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7"><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div8"></div><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div9"><span class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div9_span10">直播5-19 19:00开始</span></div><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div11"></div></div></div></div><div class="u-liveCardStartFunc"><!--Regular if28--><div class="liveCardStartFunc-f"></div></div><div class="u-liveCardEndFunc"><!--Regular if29--><div class="liveCardEndFunc-f"></div></div></a></div>

<div class="u-liveCard-container  f-fl f-transition ga-click" data-cate="首页_推荐课程" data-action="【考研数学】祥叔复习全书收官篇点击" data-label="//www.icourse163.org/live/480000002017601.htm"><a href="//www.icourse163.org/live/480000002017601.htm" target="_blank" class="u-liveCard-container_a1"><div class="u-liveCard-img"><img width="236" height="136" alt="" src="https://edu-image.nosdn.127.net/0f293297abea4fe482b2f7fb2ce0032c.jpg?imageView&amp;quality=100" class="u-liveCard-img_img2"></div><div class="u-liveCard-imgTop"></div><div class="u-liveCard-title"><span class="u-liveCard-title_span3">【考研数学】祥叔复习全书收官篇</span></div><div class="u-liveCard-teacher"><span class="f-thide u-liveCard-teacher_span4">武忠祥教授</span></div><div class="u-liveCard-school"><span class="f-thide u-liveCard-school_span5">武忠祥教授</span></div><div class="u-liveCard-desc"><span class="u-liveCard-desc_span6">强化阶段来袭，你做好准备了么</span></div><div class="u-liveCardOnFunc"><!--Regular if30--><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t"><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7"><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div8"></div><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div9"><span class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div9_span10">直播5-19 20:00开始</span></div><div class="liveCardOnFunc-t_div7_div11"></div></div></div></div><div class="u-liveCardStartFunc"><!--Regular if31--><div class="liveCardStartFunc-f"></div></div><div class="u-liveCardEndFunc"><!--Regular if32--><div class="liveCardEndFunc-f"></div></div></a></div>

<div class="m-selfDefineNoDiscuss-container">
<div class="m-selfDefine-catName">
<a href="//www.icourse163.org/channel/3005.htm" target="_blank" class="m-selfDefine-catName_a343"><span class="m-selfDefine-catName_a343_span344">文学文化</span></a>
</div>
<div class="m-selfDefine-lessonFunc">
<div class="selfDefine-lessonFunc-i">
<div class="selfDefine-lessonFunc-i_div348" title="">
<div class="selfDefine-lessonFunc-i_div348_div349" title="">
<img width="236" height="324" alt="20世纪技术革命与现代主义的兴起" data-src="https://edu-image.nosdn.127.net/49be3fc5b0e94071bdf63af5d30373cc.png?imageView&amp;quality=100&amp;type=webp&amp;lossless=1" class="selfDefine-lessonFunc-i_div348_div349_img350 lazyload" src="https://edu-image.nosdn.127.net/49be3fc5b0e94071bdf63af5d30373cc.png?imageView&amp;quality=100&amp;type=webp&amp;lossless=1">
</div>
<div class="#DF92FF ga-click selfDefine-lessonFunc-i_div348_div351" title="">

<div class="f-thide ga-click lessonCard-list-f_div362_div363" title="" data-cate="首页_分类课程推荐" data-action="课时点击" data-label="//www.icourse163.org/learn/SWJTU-1002530024?tid=1002701022#/learn/content?type=detail&amp;id=1212173300&amp;cid=1216326936">

<div class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f">
<div class="f-fl f-transition ga-click f-scaleSubImg11 selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371" title="" data-cate="首页_分类课程推荐" data-action="法学" data-label="点击类型[小图]//www.icourse163.org/course/NKU-1003409012#/info">

</div>
<div class="f-thide selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div377" title="">
<span class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div377_span378">西北农林科技大学</span>
</div>
<div class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div379" title="">
<span class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div379_span380"><span class="u-icon-person"></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;3467</span>
</div></a>
</div>
</div>

<div class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f">

<img width="236" height="136" alt="" data-src="https://edu-image.nosdn.127.net/f3b45c2811334efaa52897c2d0643120.png?imageView&amp;quality=100&amp;type=webp&amp;lossless=1" class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div373_img374 lazyload" src="https://edu-image.nosdn.127.net/f3b45c2811334efaa52897c2d0643120.png?imageView&amp;quality=100&amp;type=webp&amp;lossless=1">

<div class="f-thide selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div377" title="">
<span class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div377_span378">华中农业大学</span>
</div>
<div class="selfDefine-courseFunc-f_div371_a372_div379" title="">

</div>
<div class="p-index-studentFunc m-index-student">
<div class="p-index-studentFunc-i">
<div class="m-indexStudent-container">
<div class="m-indexStudent-title"><span>即便错过心仪的大学，也不要错过中国大学MOOC!		</span></div>
<div class="m-indexStudent-box" id="j-indexStudent-box"><div class="ux-slider-slider-wrapper f-pr" style="width: 1260px; height: 317px;">
    <!--Regular if25-->
    <div class="ux-scroll-container" style="width: 1260px; height: 317px;">
	    <div class="ux-scroll-box f-pr" style="width: 2520px; left: 0px;">
	        <!--inlcude-->
<!--Regular list-->
<div class="u-student-container epage-element epage-element f-fl"><div class="u-student-img epage-element epage-image"><img width="94" height="94" alt="陈睿" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/03B3283015E4A7AEBA2F62705D7A6068.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=94y94&amp;quality=100" class="u-student-img_img49"></div><div class="u-student-name epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-name_span50">陈睿</span></div><div class="u-student-desc epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-desc_span51">我第一次感受到故宫角楼在夕阳下震撼的美，便是在考完《中国古代建筑艺术》之后的那个下午；学完了《不朽的艺术》，再去博物馆不再是陪儿子完成任务了。学习MOOC之前和之后的对比，让我感受最深的就是鲍勃·迪伦的那句“昔日我曾苍老，如今风华正茂” 。</span></div><div class="u-student-school epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-school_span52">北京某事业单位 公务员</span></div></div>

<div class="u-student-container epage-element epage-element f-fl"><div class="u-student-img epage-element epage-image"><img width="94" height="94" alt="周昀" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/534DC33D9C26EB680537236EFF907B4A.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=200y200&amp;quality=100" class="u-student-img_img49"></div><div class="u-student-name epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-name_span50">周昀</span></div><div class="u-student-desc epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-desc_span51">中国大学MOOC帮助我在专业上更进一步：《公司金融》，《财务管理》，《会计学》，《大学英语口语》，《大学英语写作》，我刷了一遍又一遍。很显然，卿不负我如来亦此，我等来了命运对我的眷顾，成为浙大一名准博士生。</span></div><div class="u-student-school epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-school_span52">中南财经政法大学 工商管理</span></div></div>

<div class="u-student-container epage-element epage-element f-fl"><div class="u-student-img epage-element epage-image"><img width="94" height="94" alt="刘瑜" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/188D3CE39192F285304A2AA8AAE570D6.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=200y200&amp;quality=100" class="u-student-img_img49"></div><div class="u-student-name epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-name_span50">刘瑜</span></div><div class="u-student-desc epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-desc_span51">原来学习是可以上瘾的。我相信只要找对打开姿势，都会被慕课的魅力所吸引：分课程做笔记；听到精彩的地方，写两笔小感悟；有困惑的地方，在讨论区总有热心的学友们答疑解惑；偶尔还能得到老师的评语，受宠若惊啊。</span></div><div class="u-student-school epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-school_span52">北京某软件公司 测试兼商务英语培训师</span></div></div>

<div class="u-student-container epage-element epage-element f-fl"><div class="u-student-img epage-element epage-image"><img width="94" height="94" alt="崔常山" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/D55A842CEACAF57AAB547FDCA8822470.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=200y200&amp;quality=100" class="u-student-img_img49"></div><div class="u-student-name epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-name_span50">崔常山</span></div><div class="u-student-desc epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-desc_span51">我没有受到正规的大学教育，更没有听过大学老师的讲课。自己的两个本科文凭，都是自考的。因此看到有那么多自己曾经无限羡慕的大学，犹如一个从没有见过糖果的小孩子一下子见到那么多诱人的糖果，那种欣喜若狂，不知道大家能否想象得出……</span></div><div class="u-student-school epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-school_span52">报社记者，正准备往律师方向发展</span></div></div>

<div class="u-student-container epage-element epage-element f-fl"><div class="u-student-img epage-element epage-image"><img width="94" height="94" alt="刘纪孔" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/ECC8F44844DBDEFDBFF5C8B5FB498D40.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=200y200&amp;quality=100" class="u-student-img_img49"></div><div class="u-student-name epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-name_span50">刘纪孔</span></div><div class="u-student-desc epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-desc_span51">我是一个七十多岁的退休人员，也是慕课粉丝。上了年纪的人学习有两座大山拦着前进的大方向：一是记忆力衰退，二是电脑水平不高。但是，也有两大法宝：一是时间充沛，二是心无旁骛。我在人生的黄昏时光里变得像年青人玩手机一样地迷恋着中国大学MOOC。</span></div><div class="u-student-school epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-school_span52">退休人员</span></div></div>

<div class="u-student-container epage-element epage-element f-fl"><div class="u-student-img epage-element epage-image"><img width="94" height="94" alt="舢板" src="//edu-image.nosdn.127.net/344B88BAEE67F96BE5D7D3185873C360.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=200y200&amp;quality=100" class="u-student-img_img49"></div><div class="u-student-name epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-name_span50">舢板</span></div><div class="u-student-desc epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-desc_span51">我起初的工作是建筑施工的技术员，干了快三年了，想有所提高，成为一名管理人员。一次偶然的机会，我接触到中国大学MOOC的《工程项目管理》。课程知识非常实用，在面试时，让我游刃有余。可以说，因为慕课，我开始了人生的新阶段。</span></div><div class="u-student-school epage-element epage-text"><span class="u-student-school_span52">工程项目管理员</span></div></div>


	    </div>
    </div>
     <div class="ux-right-nav f-pa ga-click" data-action="0" data-label="右"><span class="ux-icon-caret-right u-icon-circle-caret-right"></span></div>
<!--Regular if26-->
</div></div>

</div>
</div>

<div class="title">感谢您选择中国大学MOOC！</div>
<div class="content">
<p>我们非常重视您的个人信息和隐私保护。为了更好的保证您的个人权益，在您使用我们的产品前，请您认真阅读<a target="_blank" href="//www.icourse163.org/topics/yinsi_m/">《有道隐私政策》</a>与<a target="_blank" href="//www.icourse163.org/about/contactus.htm#/contactus?type=5">《中国大学MOOC平台协议》</a>的全部内容，同意并接受全部条款后开始使用我们的产品和服务。</p>
<p>点击“同意”，即表示您同意并接受全部条款。若不同意，将无法享受中国大学MOOC产品与服务。</p>
